name: Pyright LSP
description: Python language server (Pyright) for Claude Code, providing static type checking and code intelligence.
longDescription: Integrates Microsoft `pyright` as a language server for Python files (`.py`, `.pyi`). Provides static type checking, code intelligence, go-to-definition, find references, and diagnostics. Install via `npm install -g pyright`, `pip install pyright`, or `pipx install pyright`.
